Class FinanceController

                                     int rid)
                              throws FinancialRecordException
        Retrieves a financial record by its ID from the given list.
        Parameters:

        rid - The ID of the financial record to retrieve.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        FinancialRecordException - If the financial record with the given ID is not found.

      • addRecord

        public void addRecord(int id,
                      java.lang.String date,
                      java.lang.String descrip,
                      double amt,
                      java.lang.String recType)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      DatabaseConnectionException
        Adds a new financial record to the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the financial record.
        date - The date of the financial record.
        descrip - The description of the financial record.
        amt - The amount of the financial record.
        recType - The type of the financial record.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
        DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
